entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:03 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow early this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023
